content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting out on the deck with my mother who was in town to enjoy autumn in colorado.  it was a clear night, and we were enjoying the cool air and night sky...It was full of stars!  we were sitting facing east, and took a break in conversation to look up at what turned out to be the right time. i caught sight of something moving in a straight line across the sky, fast and smooth like a meteorite, and from what i could tell, above the atmosphere. it was not bright, but dark and more opaque, but still visible.  its shape is what intrigued me the most...It was like six diamond-shaped objects asymmetrically arranged in a check-mark formation.  it moved like it was one object, though. i'd say it took about 3 seconds for it to cross the visible sky from east to west, before i lost sight of it over the roof of my house.  at first, i thought it might be an owl;  however, it was too asymmetrical and obviously far away to be that. it didn't look like anything else i had ever seen! 
my mom saw it too, which was nice for me to confirm i wasn't seeing things!  she described the look of the object like it had the klingon's ship-cloaking ability. she wasn't sure what she was seeing at first either, and we have concluded that  "ufo" is definitely the most appropriate label.
we were both a little awestruck, as it's not every day you see something so out of the ordinary and mysterious.  it is both exciting and a little frightening, i suppose.  i am certain that life exists out there beyond earth, but i would call myself a cautious believer in the idea that some have already visited us. i wonder if maybe what i saw was a creation of our military.  i might not ever know, but my gut tells me it was not of earth.  the truth is out there, and now i feel a little closer to it...
content.summary: Opaque, "cloaked" check-mark formation of 6 diamond-shaped objects moving together fast like a meteorite

content.detailedDescription:
Working at night. 
its brightness. 
satellite. 
star like, extinguishing, re illuminating, changing directions. 
the lights on my truck flickered and my cellphone restarted. i thought it was pretty cool. 
but i have seen this a couple months ago heading about the same trajectory but over the airport that time. 
it extinguished again.
content.summary: I work outside at night, (surface mine) near airport. i know aircraft. the "craft" @1st seedme like a satellite but much slower, then an airplane was coming in to close quarters. it then extinguished until plane passed relit dimmer switches east and moved

content.detailedDescription: At about around 5:30 am on 9/27/2016 i had notice a rather strange light in the sky,  as soon as i noticed it started moving towards the east from where i was looking as if it had notice me see it. i have witness several other times strange lights moving in the sky as well in the early mornings and have failed to report them. they seem to just fade out as if it started to move either east or going straight up or turning off a light. i know this couldn’t be an airplane because it would have the standard blinking lights and it was not cloudy outside as i could see the stars around this particular light i seen when it vanished, it wasn’t a meteor because this thing didn't fall towards the ground it just moved a bit and the light on what i have seen just faded out.
content.summary: Still light, noticed it and darted off

content.detailedDescription: On tuesday night, while walking the dogs, i noticed a bright light traveling from southwest to northeast. this is not unusual, we see any number of passenger and military jets passing overhead. and yes we can hear them as well, even the passenger jets at altitude.  i always look at the night sky when i am outside. what was strange is there were no blinking marker lights... only the bright white light. as it traversed the crossed my field of view the intensity of the light never changed, even when it was obviously traveling away from me. never seen the headlight of a plane from behind before. again no marker or nav lights, no sound whatsoever. traveling too slow to be a satellite and i have seen plenty of those over the years. i am 53 yrs. old and was raised in a military family so i know jets and can estimate speeds.  i am not urge what i saw, but it was interesting and somewhat exciting. the object appeared to be the same size as jupiter as view from my back yard. now i know some say well then you must have seen jupiter...Mbut jupiter doesn't travel at the speed this thing crossed the sky. unfortunately i didn't have a camera ,do no photos. i would love to see it again and get one photos.As isaid earlier it traveled from southwest to northeast, this is not the usual direction for jets in our area. bottom line... i'm sure i didn't see the usual jet or even a satellite , not ure what i saw, but i would love to see it again... just a light with no obvious outline and completely silent.
content.summary: Bright light traveling sw to ne lasting about three minutes

content.detailedDescription:
Working at night. 
its brightness. 
satellite. 
star like, extinguishing, re illuminating, changing directions. 
the lights on my truck flickered and my cellphone restarted. i thought it was pretty cool. 
but i have seen this a couple months ago heading about the same trajectory but over the airport that time. 
it extinguished again.
content.summary: I work outside at night, (surface mine) near airport. i know aircraft. the "craft" @1st seedme like a satellite but much slower, then an airplane was coming in to close quarters. it then extinguished until plane passed relit dimmer switches east and moved

content.detailedDescription:
At approx. 10pm on 9/27/16 a quality control inspector was taking a photo of a open pipe at the plant i work at and unknowingly snapped a photo of some odd lights. they appeared in a circular pattern, and looked to be a blue-green hue. 
there is a air force base very close by and a small civilian airport as well.
content.summary: Blue-green lights near vance afb

content.detailedDescription: Originally, i thought it was a satelite or the space station.  i love to watch the sky as an amature astronomer. my father is a pilot so i know what aircrafts look like too. this was normal looking for a satelite or the space station.  i checked the location of the space station and it was visible elsewhere and at a different time and not at the direction i was veiwing.  i decided it was a satelite until i felt strange, so i said "hello" quietly to myself.  i felt a strange sensation and was almost like hypnotized. as i was watching, 2 bright flashes appeared behind it, their duration was literally 1 second each.  it felt like the ufo was friendly whatever it was.  i have no idea what the flashes were as they were not attached to the ufo nor were they emitted from the ufo. i was frozen watching until my dog ran into my legs and knocked me off my feet. i ran inside to see online what was in the area.  all the other objectx in the sky were either at a different part of the sky or at a different time.  as i am writing this, i am watching for the space station which is sw,ssw tonight in about a few minutes.  it is obvious that what i saw was not the space station, what i saw was traveling n. it felt like somthing was trying to communicate.  im completely confused at what i saw.  i seem to see these things frequently when star gazing.  often times i know what it is (airplane, satelite, space station, etc.), other times i have no explanation. this is not my first sighting but this is my first in ofallon, mo. the flashes behind it concern me and the weird feeling, that hasn't happened before to me.  it almost looked like they were being shot at from space?!?  the flashes did not look at all like meteors etc.
content.summary: Light traveling higher than planes etc. with light flashes behind it twice.

content.detailedDescription:
Observed an extremely bright light north of us rt 30 while driving east on the road.  was far too bright to be a star/planet.  the light appeared stationary, was white in color, and did not flicker at all. there were no additional lights and no tail. because i was driving i could not maintain constant observation. after several seconds observing it at the constant luminosity, i glanced back from the road and it had dimmed, but continued not to flicker and stayed at the dimmer luminosity for several seconds.  several seconds later i glanced back from the road and it had disappeared. do not now if it "left", landed, or just vanished.

based on the sighting i can rule out a plane, helicopter, star/planet, or man-made satellite. because of the light appeared stationary, did not flicker at all, and had no tail a meteor seems very unlikely.
content.summary: Extremely bright stationary light observed north of us rt 30 in st. thomas, pa near dusk.

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside getting something from my car around 8:00pm pst. i looked up in the sky and noticed airplanes and noticed two red lights that were flying in circles overhead. one of the lights became more prominent and the other seemed to become more dim or fade out into the distance.
i thought the objects could be a plane or drone as lax is about 20 miles away. however the objects were flying in circles/hovering, they seemed like they were at too high of an altitude to be a plane or drone. if it was a plane, it would be flying in a linear path towards/away lax. i observed the objects for about 15 minutes flying back and forth. i went inside to grab something and came back out and they had disappeared out of sight. the last direction i saw the object flying was east.
content.summary: Two red blinking lights flying in circles overhead

content.detailedDescription:
A faint light that headed south very fast, crossed the entire sky in under 20 seconds.

much too fast to be a plane or a satellite

didn't burn up in the sky like a meteorite
content.summary: Faint light headed south very fast

content.detailedDescription: I was in the bathroom in the back of the house and saw it around rt 23 usually when you see a plane it keeps going but when i saw this it was not moving and it disappeared scared for my life it was so bright as gray may come back warn local area government please thank you i didn't like what i saw
content.summary: Bright round grey

content.detailedDescription: At 7:25 pm on 9-27-2016 i looked out my window to see 5 bright lights floating over lake michigan. specifically in front of the south street beach area of evanston,il. they were initially in a linear formation and then moved to a t formation. three of the orbs slowly broke away to form a triangle. after 30 minutes the orbs disappeared. a delivery driver coming to my home also saw the lights. there were planes flying past these lights. i have photos and video.
content.summary: 5 floating orbs over lake michigan. i have pictures and video.

content.detailedDescription: I was stationed at yakima firing center. i was supporting night fire of 155mm sp howitzers. we where sitting on op 1 observing the impact area as the battalion range safety. we would sit on op 1 and report the impacts when asked by the fso. i would use my glid on the fist-v to lase the impact of the shell and report the polar position to the fdc. during a break me and my assistant where sitting on top on the track with the hammer head up. just watching the sky wearing nvg's while monitoring the radio. we observed a object coming from the south and watched it thinking it was a satellite until it stopped. it was about half way up from the horizon. i jumped down the rabbit hole and powered up the glid and set it to illuminate and looking through the scope i found the object as it was moving very very slowly like drifting. i squeezed the cadillac's (trigger) and it jumped 5-10 degrees from where it was and i switched the glid to designate and squeezed the triggers again the object moved from south to west i then continued to squeeze the triggers and lead the object and it followed the beam. during the observation/interaction the object changed direction as in 90 turns several times. the specialist that was my rto/driver was also observing the object outside the track. i logged the incident in the report i made and i was never contacted by anyone. clear night no cloud cover. elevation 4500 feet. op 1 yakima firing center.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I spotted the object through my nvg's and then through the glid

content.detailedDescription: I was travelling southbound on i 5 at fort lewis main gate exit. i was looking forward when this sphere shaped object came across my field of view. i observed this object for about 5-6 full seconds. i came from over the sound and crossed over fort lewis main post. the object ascended at a 45 degree angle and was out of sight in a flash. the object emitted a steady glow and was sort of bullet shaped like a 7.62 boat tail but no flat end it tapered across the length like a dinner plate being turned upside down. the weather was clear blue sky a few clouds. this happened at 1141hrs pst.
content.summary: Object came across my line of sight while ascending at a 45 degree angle.

content.detailedDescription: Was walking home from friend late at night around midnight and was messing about with my phone and the streetlights were out so i notice the chance to test the phone camera on the stars to see if i could see any and snapped a picture of the one that seemed to shine brighter than the rest and in that second when snapping the picture something runs passing infront of me and down a hill that was on my left side which was bigger than a cat and made a werid sound, could have been a badger or so but the timing was scary because i went into defense mode since it was all black and i couldnt see any and i walked forward because i felt something was there but when i kept walking it was just silent and i walked home with nothing more happening. a couple hours later i remember the picture i took, which i didnt look at yet and when i look at it and zoom in i see a strange black outlining looking like 1-2 disc shaped objects with 1 light source in each one, not noticeable until zooming in. showed it to a friend today, the day after and will attach the picture now.
content.summary: Took a picture of a star to test new phone-camera and saw a strange silhoutte with 2 lights

content.detailedDescription: I was letting my dog in my house when i heard a helicopter behind the treeline by our house. expecting a helicopter to come over the trees but instead i see a white ball of light come first. it was just gliding through the air very smoothley then following the light came the helicopter it was black with only one flashing light on the bottom. the light zipped forward away from the chopper then the light stopped as it was waiting on the chopper to catch up. then the light even went under the chopper and then zipped out in front of the chopper again before making a large swooping right turn very fast behind the opposite treeline which it appeared.The chopper followed with much much slower swooping right turn behind the treeline as it tried to stay with the light. i could no longer see either aircraft only could hear the loud thuds of the chopper getting further away from our house. we then waited outside hoping they would pass again but never seen them return. i then called my friend who lives afew miles up the road in the direction that the objects came and him and his girlfriend did hear the helicopter pass over their home as well but did go outside to see the light and helicopter. i also called 911 to make a report and asked if they had any other reports but was given no answers they only asked me questions and he never answered my question if they had any other reports. thankyou for taking the time to read this
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A ball of white light with a black helicopter following\chasing behind.The helicopter had only one red flashing light on bottom

content.detailedDescription: Me and my wife were driving east when we noticed something od about the cloud.
content.summary: Just curious if this is smething . would like outers to see these pictures and tell me what they think.

content.detailedDescription:
30 of july 2016 in tavira in portugal
we saw a sworm of blinking lights in the air over the house in north.
it is very diffucult to tell what distanse from us, but pretty far from the roof.

 they changed positions in the group while standing there. i took some pictures. 
after some minutes they moved to south side og the house and stood there 
 some more minutes befor they moved up to the sky.

they were far to big to be insects.
content.summary: A sworm of blinking lights in the air over the house. moved south then up to the sky

content.detailedDescription:
Saw object after dark in sky.   was in western sky.   thought it may be airplane, except it had red, white and blue lights.  airplane would have
red, white and green.  caught my attention, it fell towards earth, then ab-
ruptly changef course to horizontal right and left. i don't know of any aircraft that can stop and turn left and right.   it left area by heading west. people don't want to hear about it, they think i am crazy.
content.summary: Saw object in sky, bright white, red, blue, and changed direction.

content.detailedDescription: Two nights ago about 8:30pm 6 total objects flew south of our house. first 3 objects flew by with one object turned directly south the other two flew from the southeast to the northwest.  15 sec later a single objected followed the direction of the two that flew to the north west. 10 or 15 seconds later 2 more objects followed the path of the first 2 which was to the north west. the problem was these were not aircraft of any known type. there appeared to be no sound. the object that turned south appeared to turn at a quicker rate than aircraft i have seen. it was not 90degrees but damn close. what was the most disconcerting to me is they all had est.5 orange lights displayed in wedge shape. these were no aircraft. there was no red , green  or strobe lights on any of the 6 object.
content.summary: 6 wedge shaped air craft

content.detailedDescription: We have been going at night watching the stars for months. when one night we we're looking up and saw an object moving across the sky very quickly and then it disappeared. well now we are watching every night. in this past week we have witnessed over 40 ufos of varying sizes shapes and colors. as of right now we have only seen 4 in the daytime, one that was white like a cloud and moved so fast across the sky that one blink and it was gone. the next time was a tube shape that was either glowing a reddish orange color or it was highly reflective, this one also had a sort of barrel shaped object come out of it that was black on the top and bottom and glowed a bright light in the center. the last one we saw as of now was really unnerving cause it was right up over the trees just floating like a balloon it was sort of oblong shaped but short and thick. the color of this one was brown and it looked like it had some sort of black lines. all the others have been at night and they blink, pulse they move slow, fast, they stop and sit for hours, they make u-turns, loops and wobble. i've tried to get pictures but my phone camera and tablet camera just want pick them up at night. the only one i could've gotten a good picture of was the brown looking one but i didn't have my phone. we would love for someone with some good cameras come and record these. please help us get some evidence.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Numerous sightings from 9/20-16 and still seeing them every night

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were running errands at about 9:00 at night (normal for us) and i saw a really bright light in the sky when we were driving back home. it was fairly small, but so bright that i almost had to squint looking at it. i asked my husband what he thought it was (a light from a local tower... that we passed seconds after the event), but as i didn't remember seeing that light before i kept watching. then it turned into a triangle of three lights, two red and one green, blinking a little like an airplane, and it slowly started moving away (not behind as we were driving, but across).

there was a big atv festival in town, and it's possible it could have had something to do with that. i'm usually pretty good at identifying things in the night sky--planets, planes, satellites, and floating lanterns, but this didn't make sense. especially after it changed shape and started flying off. it didn't move quickly and i didn't get to observe it for more than a few seconds, but it didn't look familiar.
content.summary: Bright light turned into triangle.

content.detailedDescription: I was taking the garbage out to the dumpster outside in the parking lot at my apartment complex at 9:15pm. (september 14? not 100% sure of date) i looked up at the mountains and saw a glowing flaming object flying across the sky. west to east direction right over my head and over the town of fernie b.C. it was lower then a plane would fly. at first i thought it was a meteor; however it kept flying a straight controlled path. it left a long white trail behind the flaming ball and was moving at a high rate of speed. by the time i got out my camera phone to record the object it was already out of sight, into the valley between the mountains. i was not surprised or scared, simply unable to identify what i saw. said to myself: i think i just saw a ufo and laughed. i told my wife about it when i got inside. she suggested i report it to mufon.
content.summary: Taking out garbage looked up in direction of mountains and saw bright flaming object fly buy very fast from west to east disapeard over the mountains.

content.detailedDescription: At a friends house in north hollywood. he had just got some new night vision binoculars. told me to check them out. i started mesiing with them. adjusting the zoom and the blur. i looked around with them and saw nothing. when i sat down and looked in the direction i was facing i noticed something unusual. at first i couldnt believe it. i looked in the direction without the binoculars and saw nothing. with them i still saw it there. so it was invisible to the naked eye. this is when i was in awe. i was saying "wow, amazing". my friend thought i was just messing with him. then i told him to look and pointed in the direction he should try to see. he couldnt believe it himself. i would say it was in the same place for about 15 minutes until it was not there any more. when using a telescope to look at the moon, you have to adjust it because it moves. this didnt. it stayed in its place. so what we saw was three lights, orbs or round objects. one was stationary in the center. the other two went around the stationary one in sync. one from the left, the other from the right. it was perfect. not even touching each other, but passing close by each other. when it got closer to the one in the center they moved fast, and slowing down as it got to its far side. they both had an oval orbit. the one from the left, would go around the center one on its right side. the one on the right would go around the center one's left side. this was only visible with the night vision binoculars. only reason im reporting this is because i heard one of the mufon guys on coast to coast. and it sounds like it can be possible someone else has seen this as well.
content.summary: Observed with night vision binocular

content.detailedDescription: Step out to porch for late night view toward west (about 3 am) and saw a small, bright, steady, white orb travelling high rate of speed and at altitude of approximately 30 -35 thousand feet with viewing from treetop to treetop, s to n, w/no tail. trajectory was shallow entry toward earth. did see falling meteorite (from se to nw) a minute or so before which made me notice as it was clearly different due to direction, dim to bright to dim/dark light pattern. is not denver traffic as it traveled at a high rate of speed and traffic usually travels south.
content.summary: Bright, steady white orb travelling high altitude from treetop to treetop s to n w/no trail

content.detailedDescription: I left my parents headed home 20 min away. i saw a light with a weird flight pattern. it was fast and amazing with its up and down pattern. i pulled out my phone and started recording. although that phone quit working and i used a different phone from that day. i have found a picture in my account files and not a video. it was not download able/. i am confirmed. i have many indications and know something is out there. i do believe they have been to my home since then. sounds crazy but i have a dreamlike suspicion of them yelling my name and entering my bedroom. i had a circle on my hand afterwards. this is all starting to come back to me and wish i would've noticed this and reported earlier, had i found this sight.
content.summary: I saw and recorder this light at 11:00 p.M. and relized a time loss at 3:00a.M.

content.detailedDescription:
As a security officer on patrol 2300 to 0700 in ne calgary. between 0300 0400 i glanced up. 
i saw a very large circle and within it's borders it was white like light being reflected off a pure white (sheet). their were three bars spreading out from it's centre. no sound was apparent, it could be that it was too far away

now because i have seen other strange sights previously,i started carrying binoculars. didn't have a camera.
i was very excited though at the prospect of it being not from of this world and or ( an other dimension ). 

i watched as it appeared to turn up side down, just before it disappeared completely i saw what reminded me of a lobsters mottled shell, it looked red and black, although i can't be sure as it was dark and quite a distance away. then it was gone,completely without transition 
no trails or any other anomalies.

i have done research to see if any other reports and nothing, i have tried to contact several persons but none have gotten back.

also several weeks later myself and another person that reported to the local sun newspaper. it stated that while driving north on deerfoot trail the female driver saw a glowing red object came down through the clouds and that it zoomed of to the west. some so called scientists from the university of calgary said it was a meteor. bah i say!!!

i myself saw something a little different, the cloud cover was very high, for all purposes non existent to what i saw.
 
at first i thought ok it's a chopper with its search light on. the thing is that it did not move from straight ahead, watching this for about six / eight minutes and as it came closer i noted it was round and it was changing colours, from pastel greens, blues and reds flowing all through it like it was fluid. it was not large, about the size of a basket ball approximately a mile away. it came to a dead stop, like it was hesitating then came around in a tight circle zipped off to the west at an impossible speed.
content.summary: security on patrol circular luminescent three bars merging at centre stationary seemingly turned over

content.detailedDescription: Early yesterday evening, i was playing in my backyard with my children. i notice a very wide moondawg surrounding the sun. i thought it would be nice to grab a few photographs. i didn't see anything with the naked eye. but upon review of the photos, there are some unique objects noticed. the three photos submitted were taken within milliseconds of each other. please zoom in to the area above the tree on the far left. i will also submit two zoomed-in screenshots. these were all taken with a cell phone. once i realized there were some strange features in each photo, i felt a little confused. i've shown three of my photographer friends to ask if they've ever gotten a reflection from the sun that was in this manner. so far, two have replied no. they both stated it was rather strange. the third has not yet replied.
content.summary: Was photographing moon dog. reviewed photos later and notice something unique. there are three separate photos.

content.detailedDescription:
Late april 2000, 23 miles northeast of morón afb (seville), spain. around 7:15 p.M. still broad daylight, i was driving home from my workplace, alone as usual. there were no cars then on that stretch of back road from marchena to écija (province of seville, spain). i had just entered a mile and a half long straight section of road when from my left side, from behind a hill, as if taking off from the ground in a movement along an arc of circle, a streak of light caught my eye, which almost instantly i recognized as a red sphere of light that was coming right towards my car. i jumped in my seat but somehow my scare turned into cold-blooded curiosity when the sphere immediately came to a sudden halt, perhaps not more than 60 yards away from me, as if it had been aware of me, and then changed direction, and continued moving ahead of me in a straight line parallel to the road and then it started blinking within fractions of a second. it was then, very much to my surprise, that another orb of light, same size, this one yellowish, was wiggling behind the first orb, hurrying along from the same direction the first one had appeared, till it started tailing the first sphere in a straight line, both following the contour of the fields, blinking at the same time and flying very low, all the while parallel to the road. they slightly increased their speed and disappeared behind a low hill. from the start i had time to check my speed, first i was driving at 87 mph, then i lowered my window because i wanted to be sure that what i was watching was real and it sure was. i reduced speed trying to listen to some noise coming from the orbs, and i couldn't hear anything apart from the wind rushing in. both lights were perfect spheres, they had the size of a ping pong ball at arm’s length, maybe a little smaller. before they disappeared, i flashed my high beams for some seconds at the same time they were blinking. somehow i wanted them to know by doing so  that i was there. the whole episode may have lasted for about 30 seconds, at the most. as soon as i could pull over, i phoned my wife to tell her what i had seen. i was excited and she was nine months pregnant, and got a little scared. she asked me to get home as soon as possible, which i did. from then on i am absolutely sure that something really really strange is out there.
i had seen strange lights moving in the night sky before. on one occasion in córdoba (spain) in august, 1987 around 1:00 a.M, it was really weird. i was with a friend, we were sitting on his doorstep, chatting while looking at the stars. suddenly, a white star like light, which was there like any other star, started moving slowly, i nudged him pointing to the star and said: can you see what i see? he said suuure. the light stopped and then suddenly flashed out of sight. seconds later, it flashed back into sight again a little bit to our left and started jumping up and down in a zigzag motion crossing a large stretch of sky, and then suddenly flashed out of sight again at an incredible speed this time leaving a long streak of light behind. we were amazed and unable to identify what we had just seen. it definitely was not anything we could think of.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Two blinking orbs of light (red and yellowish) flying low and parallel to a back road in southern spain

content.detailedDescription:
I am a veteran of the military and an amateur astronomer so i am pretty good at aircraft identifications and where lights should be in the sky. last night, 09/25/2016 at approximately 20:15 i saw what looked to be a triangle shaped craft over the city of eugene oregon. 

i had just stepped out on my balcony for a smoke and sat down in my chair facing east overlooking most of ne eugene and n springfield. looking in the sky above and well beyond the neighbors house at the sight line of the power lines i saw 3 orange lights equidistant apart and in a triangle. it occurred to me that there shouldn't be bright stars in the sky in that area that time of night and time of year so i  looked closer. 

as i  looked closer i saw the bottom most of the lights moving and then i thought to myself: that makes sense it is commercial aviation. so i looked back at the other 2 lights and saw they were moving together too and that it was one triangle shaped craft rotating on its center axis. all the while i  noticed the bright orange lights were shining through what looked like heat shimmer coming off the desert floor.

very much like a scene from the movie "predator" the "cloaking" around it wavered for just a brief second and when it did i saw a large triangle shaped craft with smooth sides and a smooth metallic bottom with a smaller circular abutment in the center with a light bluish glow. the craft stopped rotating and it looked like a harrier jet pulling up its nose on a vertical takeoff and then it disappeared. it did leave but as it was leaving the "cloaking" kicked back in and it disappeared from sight.

like something out of the x files 2 helicopters showed up within 30 seconds of the object disappearing. eugene is a small city and helicopters are fairly rare here with just a couple of overflights a day but these stayed on station for the better part of an hour circling over the eugene/springfield area.
content.summary: A triangle shaped craft with orange lights.
